content.description: Sit start the sheer headwall using the obvious feature at waist height. Move right to a high, distant crimp and the trend slightly left to top out at the high point of the boulder.
content.location: The sheer headwall located in the small alcove.

content.description:
This is a fun little problem that climbs an undercut arete just past the Alcove Boulder. The holds are friendly so this could be a nice warm up for harder climbs on the Alcove or DNA boulder.

 Sit start under the arete on the furthest right rail. Gain the arete and crank up to a good hold on the upper face then top out. Downclimb the other side of the boulder using a jug at the top of a crack.
content.location: If facing away from the climbs on the Alcove Boulder, keep walking past a few smaller jumbled blocks and find the arete.

content.description: Sit start on obvious feature at waist level. (Same start as for the problem Wolverine.) Instead of moving straight up move right on a series of crimps and bad foot smears and then top out.

pathTokens: 1. Kinsman Notch East (aka The Monkey Cliffs) Climbing &

content.description: A cool boulder located in a small, sunny alcove.
